We decided to give this place a shot to celebrate our 5th wedding anniversary and we could not have been happier. Alannah and her husband were great! The first day was in the upper 90's but the treehouse felt great. The a/c and both ceiling fans put out plenty of air. On the first night we were hoping for some lightning shows or a nice sunset but it was too cloudy for a sunset and the storm may have been far off but it gave great views. The LED light strips made up for the lacking storms and was a nice touch on both levels of the house. The windows all the way around on both levels provides many different views. We really enjoyed sitting on the top deck with the solar lights enjoying the silence of the evening. The bed was very comfortable and we could have laid there all day. The second day was much cooler out and we were able to use the hot tub. My wife did not have water to her knee yet when she stated "I am not leaving this for a few hours". With the strong cool wind whipping through, it could not have been much better. We did not get a chance to try out the fire pit on this trip but hope to make it back in the cooler months. That evening we had a wonderful sunset that you could see from 3 sides of the house. A storm rolled in around 11pm and seemed to last until morning. The lightning lit up the bedroom while the sound of heavy rain and thunder was better than any sleep music. (There were a few that startled me up.) Even with flash flood warnings being issued the walkway to and from the treehouse was well sheltered and not to messy. The main living area of the house was very clean and inviting. If you are used to lounging on a couch the chairs may not be your thing but do like we did and make a spot with out extra blankets and pillows on the floor. It worked just fine. The coat hooks on the back of the stairs was a great idea to utilize the space. We had a much needed wonderful time and we truly hope to make it back as much as possible. Do yourself a favor and book yourself some peace.
P.S. Do not let the toilet scare you, it is not anything that you will even think about after the first use. No smell and not what some may be picturing. The water lasted fine for us and if you follow the guidelines you should not have any issues.
